topic: Common assumptions in solar energy adoption and their impact on decision-making
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that my assumptions may be limiting my ability to see new opportunities or solutions. As a next step, I will list my current assumptions and critically evaluate them, considering how they might restrict my thinking or decisions. I'll also seek feedback from peers to gain diverse perspectives and identify any blind spots I might have overlooked.

metadata.trigger: What assumption am I making that might be wrong?
